Gigatron: Roger on that Defection.
::He transforms to Gigajet and flies to the embassy.  Seeing Vulois, Child, 
and some other bots he doesn't know, he lands and transforms::
Gigatron: Vulois, i am here to be child's bodyguard just in case something 
happens during his training.  I hope this is alright with you?

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------
::Cyclonus was sulking in his quarters.  Galvatron was dead, and he would not 
follow Deathsaurus.  He walks out of his quarters and sees Deathsaurus 
talking to what was left of the Neocons::
Deathsaurus: I say we destroy the CF.  With two of their bases destroyed, 
they will eventually fall apart
::Cyclonus heard this in outrage.  There was no strategy, just blind 
aggression::
Cyclonus: I disagree Deathsaurus. We should pick off the Maximals still at 
the ark first.
Deathsaurus: You DARE disagree with me?
Cyclonus: Well i-
::a battle sword seemed to materialize out of Cyclonus' torso.  He was dead 
before he hit the ground::
Jetstorm:Whoa
Deathsaurus: Well, now that that annoyance has been stopped, we need a new 
Aerocon.
::The Neocons set to work on a new member::

OOC: Cyclonus has gone to the matrix, so please honor his memory by putting 
him on the deceased list
